author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Harmeet Bedi "startofbiz.sh does not have a default debug flag." (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-2059) - OFBIZ-2059
$DEBUG flag is not specified even in comments causing people to dig an find it.
JLR's comment : that's not exactly true, there is already another DEBUG "flag" used for RMI, I think both are useful. So I have moved this "new" one near the older

author: trawick
msg: Use the virtual host settings for the request being processed instead
of those of the first FastCGI request handled by this httpd child process.
Other directives besides IPCCommTimeout could/should be checked
at config time for reasonable values.  The change for IPCCommTimeout
was required by this patch because it removed some compensation for
